thumb.title: 【Starry】今日が最高なんだもん！/ Today's the Best! 【踊ってみた】【踊オフ2025】
thumb.description: Heyyy everyone, I did this year's Odo-Off choreography~! ^w^This one is just so, so much fun! And the whole learning and filming process was very enjoyable.I thought the vocal part was a really cool and unique touch, so I tried to replicate that on my cover. I know I never really speak or sing in any of my videos, so please enjoy these small samples of me dancing and shouting at the same time! xDHave fun with it!Choreography credits: 足太ぺんた、ありく、すぅねこ、ネス from REAL AKIBA BOYZ、ぽるし、まぁり、まなこ、まりやん、めーとる、わた、わに so44788568 Music credit: 市瀬るぽ (@LUPO_Reportage) さん sm44781886https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qx1_TCUdTbM&ab_channel=市瀬るぽ%2FIchinoseLUPO★~Where to find me~★Twitter: https://twitter.com/starrylights13Instagram: @starrylights13 - https://www.instagram.com/starrylights13/?hl=enYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/StarryLights13MyList: mylist/62719107I do not own the rights to this song. I do this for fun--no infringement is intended.
thumb.last_res_body: （ノ＾〇＾)ﾉ88888... うぽつー 888888888888 かわいい うぽつです＾＾ 8888888888 かわいい うぽつです
